}}'''''Let Mortal Heroes Since Your Fame''''' is the fifth full-length studio album by [[Summoning]] and was released in [[2001]]. This is the first Summoning album to make use of ''clean'' vocals and to make use of audio samples from radio productions of [[The Lord of the Rings]].<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Summoning/Let_Mortal_Heroes_Sing_Your_Fame/115|articlename=Summoning - Let Mortal Heroes Sing Your Name Additional Notes|author=www.metalarchives.com|accessed=28 July 2024}}</ref> Many of the lyrics are taken from, or are influenced by, [[The Hobbit]].

==Lineup==

*Protector: ''Vocals (tracks 3, 4, 6-8), Drum Programming, Keyboards, Guitars''
*Silenius: ''Vocals (tracks 2, 5, 8), Keyboards, Bass''
